posts.post_content:
Offered today will be three 19th century Team Cabinets. All are great pieces.

Cincinnati Levi A Gold Studio           SGC Auth 3500 (with Mcphee)
Browns Champions Guerin Cabinet - SGC 10 4000 Traded
Athletics VanDyke & Co -              SGC Auth 1650 Traded
Giants Sporting Times Cigar           SGC Auth 1300

Loaded with Old Judge players and HoFers. Contact Bruce Kasarda for details. Thanks

posts.post_title: Price Reduction and One More Added.
